USAGE DEFINITION: The best (highest value) of the last 2 eGFR readings is < 60 mL/min
PROVENANCE: We simplified this method from that developed by: 10.1016/j.kint.2016.04.010
CITATIONS:
Simplified from :
McDonald H.I. et al. Methodological challenges when carrying out research on CKD and AKI using routine electronic health records. Kidney International, 5 (2016), pp. 943-9.
